TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to delete a crash record.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on Cancel button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on Cancel button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on Cancel button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Delete button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Delete button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Delete button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Yes button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Yes button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Yes button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify toast message 'The record was deleted'.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify toast message 'The record was deleted'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify toast message 'The record was deleted'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify toast message 'The record was deleted'.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Search button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Search button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Search button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter search criteria.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter search criteria.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter search criteria.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Search icon.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Search icon.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Search icon.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify pop up message 'No records found'.Capture screenshot
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify pop up message 'No records found'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify pop up message 'No records found'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify pop up message 'No records found'.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click OK button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click OK button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click OK button.
